extendedInfo.description: An arcade style 3D tunnel racer with a twist in the plot!In BloodRunner, you play a futuristic miniaturized criminal agent. Over 12 beautiful arcade style racing levels you will explore the whole human body, control the target host and find your escape!  Clive, from "the agency", will be your advisor and sole link to the outside world.  Expect a few plot twists along this fantastic voyage arcade race against the clock!Race against the clock using onscreen touch joypad or device tilt (accelerometer) controls!You wonât be racing in an apocalyptic or futuristic city. No, thatâs for amateurs! - TalkAndroid.com ReviewYour journey will take you through the blood system, inside a cell nucleus, back out and around the heart, the eyes, the brain, the inner ear, the lungs, and more!  Add in a plot with a few twists and turns, and you're in for one great adventure!  Innerspace on steroids!You'll need sharp reactions to avoid the dangers lurking in the body, and time will always be a pressure!

reviews.title: Excellent developer.
reviews.comment: The game runs beautifully on my S3.  Unfortunately it\'s running slow on my Nexus 10. The developer responded immediately to my concerns and is actively trying to get the game working better for my tablet.
reviews.author: Colin Tomele

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Superb graphics and engaging game. You want to keep playing to find out which part of the body you\'ll end up in next. Reminds me of the film Fantastic Voyage, which is no bad thing.
reviews.author: Ben Dyson

reviews.title: Clever maginative game
reviews.comment: What a fantastic game - clear graphics brilliant well thought out story line with a surprise ending - this is a good game for educating kids in biology - a quality game.
reviews.author: Dennis Rigg

reviews.title: Please fix! (FIXED)
reviews.comment: Updated: The developer was kind enough to contact me to help me sort out the issues.  Seems it was an issue with Android build 4.1.2, so he  compiled a custom version for me.  After installing it, everything works flawlessly!  I\'m enjoying the game very much, great job.  Even more, I appreciate the outstanding customer supoort the developer provided.  Support this dev, buy this game.
reviews.author: Jason Feil

reviews.title: Unique
reviews.comment: Unique game play and nice graphics! Runs great on the Galaxy S3.
reviews.author: Jim Heath

reviews.title: Excellent game
reviews.comment: Brilliant graphics.  Excellent platform and huge potential for child education on biology.   Great work
reviews.author: Carl Rigg

reviews.title: Challenging & Fun
reviews.comment: This is a great game. Race against the clock to complete your missions in a very ubique setting
reviews.author: Matthew Cass
